评论概述: Not like photos at all, cheap & unpleasant feeling
评论详情: I wish I had looked closer at the picture, which is very obviously edited in post; zoom in to the left and you can see where the texture is painted out & the shirt color bleeds onto the skin. As a result of this editing, the real shirt looks NOTHING like the pictures. The photo shows e a rough, textured, loose linen shirt with a cotton drawstring run through stitched/cut holes, perfect for a renaissance fair costume. What I received was an ill-fitting, completely smooth, poorly stitched, synthetic blend, shirt with a plastic-y cord and hideous aluminum grommets. It's cheap garbage.  My favorite aspect of this that really drives home the zero care that went into this scam of a shirt is the packaging. It came in a bag that reads (verbatim, including the typos): "This bag is made of piastic. Use it for as long as you like. However,when it is no longer of use do not leave it. In the countryside of the sea. Dispose of it in a refuse confainer THE WOTLD BELONGS TO US ALL WE MUST PROTECTITI."  If they were so concerned about PROTECTITI THE WOTLD, maybe they shouldn't have manufactured a shirt that immediately made me want to follow the instructions and "Dispose of it in a refuse confainer". Returned and avoiding this company.

If you’re reading the reviews and wondering why they’re so wildly different, I have the answer.  I noticed it first about 8-9 months ago when we ordered an article of clothing on Amazon for my wife (a corset dress). The exact same listing, exact same item, but in 2 sizes to determine which one was a better fit. (It was not via the Amazon Wardrobe program).  One was branded appropriately complete with tags. It was high quality with good stitching, structure, and ribbing. The overall quality was as expected from this brand.  The second one was essentially the costume version of the item. It had no labels. The packaging was a plastic heat sealed bag. It had single stitching, no backing, no ribbing in the corset, shoe lace strings, and cheap rivets.  …and then it happened again with other clothing items. Sellers are mixing in very cheap versions of items with decent versions. They’re playing a numbers game on returns and reviews.  This shirt is one of those items. Simply read the reviews to see people who say they got a great linen shirt and others who say they got cheap crap. Once again, I got one of each. One with poor loose stitching and hanging threads, different material, and cheap feeling. One that drapes nicely and looks good and feels like the right material.  What’s really odd is that the XL and XXL both nearly fit the exact same way.

The green is intensely green. Almost lime. And the fabric is extremely thin. Reminds me of tent fabric. Not at all what it looks like in the photo. The shirt in the photo looks like it's beachy linen or like a gauze type cloth. The shirt I got feels like a cheap Halloween costume, and the v-neck isn't as deep as it looks on the picture either. Pretty disappointed

The Men's Fashion Shirt Short Sleeve Beach V-Neck Drawstring is a good choice for those looking for a casual, comfortable, and stylish option for warm weather. It balances style with functionality, making it suitable for various casual settings. However, it may not be suitable for formal occasions or cooler climates.

评论概述: Men's Fashion Shirt Short Sleeve Beach V-Neck: Relaxed Fit with a Stylish Look
评论详情: The Men's Fashion Shirt Short Sleeve Beach V-Neck is the perfect blend of comfort and style. The loose fit provides a relaxed, airy feel that's ideal for warm weather, making it great for beach days, casual outings, or even yoga sessions. Despite its laid-back fit, the shirt has a cool, eye-catching design that adds a touch of flair to any outfit. The V-neck with drawstring detail and the unique print give it a trendy, laid-back vibe that stands out. If you're looking for a shirt that offers both comfort and a fashionable look, this one is a fantastic choice.

评论概述: Tight across shoulders and chest! Small framed guys only!
评论详情: The shirt is cool and it does look good once it's on. But the reviews I read are accurate....the fabric doesn't move / flow well with my body and the shoulders and chest are very tight, even when I ordered two sizes up. As such, the shirt is not practical to move around in. Better left on smaller framed guys or on a mannequin that doesn't have to move.  This would be a good purchase if you are a dude with a small frame. If you have broad shoulders or a broad chest, there are better and similar shirts out there on amazon. (Check out my other reviews)
